documents.document: Well I definitely won't be signing up to @PopInABox_Help @PopInABox sub they couldnt get my 1st order right why should I trust them
@PopInABox_Help very disappointed, I preordered the guns roses pops, failed to send them & now say out of stock but are on special order??
Very disappointed with @PopInABox my very first order & they failed to send items I preordered, now told out of stock 😕
Bought a red nose today, I got DJ Boogie.. #rednoseday https://t.co/q1Ig1YtFrt
I'm so glad my sister bought her recliner sofa with her when she moved in #comfy
How the heck does someone spend $2m a month... 😳
I'm liking superhero double Tuesdays & Thursdays #Supergirl #TheFlash #Arrow #LegendsofTomorrow 💕
@CatWithSausages no I didn't like those two together, took me a little while to warm to this Doctor, I liked him with River Song though
Just seen the news about Peter Capaldi leaving Doctor Who... not sure what I think
We have tickets for Hamilton... 😃
I've been looking forward to wearing my brand new pyjamas all day
Gentle Storm by @Elbow reminds me of Godley and Creme's Cry
Delighted to find Sainsbury's have liquorice wheels, my favourite 😍
Whitney... #Eastenders
Wifi on the underground feels a bit weird
@AP so as apposed to creating jobs people will actually lose jobs because the research will just go else where
Left for work at 6.50am this morning, I made to work for 8.30am... had to go the long way round
So we got Sky Q and it all seems to be working
@Twitter trying search Mottingham (London) stop giving me Nottingham they are TWO different places 😕

I made it to work... feels like a victory 😃
Can't get to work, don't really know what to do... 😕

and well done to the Supreme Court, Parliament is Sovereign not Teresa May 😃

The eye roll 🙄 emoji is becoming my most used emoji at the moment...
@Jess5_11 I think those are my favourite 😍
@musicisfab71 @BSTHydePark @thekillers @Elbow @tearsforfears @whiteliesmusic I'd love to not sure I'm free that day though I'll let you know

@RitaStevenson3 yes I did, I went to the women's march in London it was amazing

#womensmarchlondon 💕 https://t.co/BmGJTwC8ml

@MeikeZane that's fantastic
